Play your favorite Casual Games on PC & Mobile

There are all kinds of games in the world and also all kinds of gamers. Some players are hardcore, they play to win and main in only a specific game. While others are playing their games to compete and get the highest score. However, there is a big chunk of players that prefer to play games only to relax and not get tied up in the competition of it all. That is where casual games come into play.

These are the games where the main objective is for the player to get to play the game itself and not to grind for winning or points. In these games, players are rewarded points for just playing the game. If you are looking to play some casual games and relax then head over to now.gg. Here you can find tons of casual games to play and you dont even have to download them. All you need to play is a browser on your PC or Mobile device and an internet connection to play any game you want.
